entry.title: Sunday: A few flurries. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 20 this morning then becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 this afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6 with temperature falling to minus 9 in the afternoon. POP 40%
